timeline.title: LunarCP
timeline.subtitle: Support Staff & Forum Moderator
description: I helped both as Forum Moderator and Support Staff for a free web hosting initiative, which in turn helped many people start their careers with web development, specially on developing countries and regions where one couldn't afford paying for hosting.
One of the challenges I had to deal with, along with the team, was tracking down and removing malicious users who created accounts for abusing, spamming and phishing.
This period of volunteer work provided me not only a lot of learning on web technologies, but also great networking and real experience with English.

timeline.title: Freelancer
timeline.subtitle: Web Developer
description: My first actual direct contact at working with web development. Developed a few institutional websites for local companies and a small CMS for a realtor.

timeline.title: Digital Video
timeline.subtitle: Video Editor
description: Worked mostly editing social events like weddings, with some experience too in camera operation, color grading and disc authoring while using tools like Adobe Premiere Pro, Photoshop, Encore, Sony DVD Architect and GrassValley Edius.

timeline.title: Foto Click Digital
timeline.subtitle: Photo Editor
description: Worked editing event and studio photography, while also creating designs for cards, clothing and similar stuff. Also worked with videography for some time and video editing for the same company.

timeline.title: B2S Marketing
timeline.subtitle: Full-stack Web Developer
description: Responsible for development, maintenance and optimization of our internal and client's applications, systems and websites, using tools like WordPress, Laravel, Lliure and CodeIgniter.
Also did some work regarding performance and SEO analysis and optimizations for existing and new clients.
